sections.sectionDescription: section provides a comprehensive API for managing product-related operations in the KeyCommerce platform. Users can create, retrieve, update, and delete products with secure API key authentication.

endpoints.title: Get Products List
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve all available products from the KeyCommerce platform. A valid API key is required for secure access.

200.description: Returns a list of products.

endpoints.title: Add Products
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows authorized users to add new products to the KeyCommerce platform. It requires both a valid API key and a bearer token for authentication.

exampleRequest.curl: curl -X POST https://keycommerce-api.onrender.com/user/products -H 'x-api-key: {{apikey}}' -H 'Authorization: Bearer {{token}}' -d '{"name": "Leather Office Chair", "description": "Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.", "price": 249.99, "category": "Office_Supplies", "productImage": "https://i.ibb.co/GTPPf5S/Leather-Offic"}'

body.name: Leather Office Chair
body.description: Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.

endpoints.title: Update Products
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows authorized users to update the details of an existing product in the KeyCommerce platform. A valid API key is required for authentication.

200.description: Product updated successfully.

exampleRequest.curl:
curl --location -g --request PUT 'https://keycommerce-api.onrender.com/user/products/{{product_id}}' \
--header 'x-api-key: {{apikey}}' \
--data '{"name": "New Branded Leather Office Chair", "price": 249.99, "description": "Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.", "category": "Office_Supplies"}'

product.name: New Branded Leather Office Chair
product.description: Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.

endpoints.title: Delete Products
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows authorized users to remove a product from the KeyCommerce platform. This action requires a valid API key for authentication.

200.description: Product deleted successfully.

404.description: Product not found or already deleted.

endpoints.title: Get Single Product
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve the details of a specific product by its unique product ID from the KeyCommerce platform. A valid API key is required to access this endpoint.

200.description: Returns the details of the requested product.

404.description: Product with the provided ID not found.

body.name: Leather Office Chair
body.description: Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.

sections.sectionDescription: section provides endpoints to manage user carts, including adding items, retrieving cart details, and clearing the cart.

endpoints.title: Get Cart Details
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve the details of all products currently in their shopping cart. A valid API key is required to access this endpoint.

200.description: Returns a list of products currently in the cart.

responseFields.productId: The unique identifier for the product in the cart.
responseFields.name: Name of the product.
responseFields.price: Price of a single unit of the product.
responseFields.qty: Quantity of the product in the cart.
responseFields.totalPrice: Total cost for the product based on quantity.
responseFields.addedAt: Timestamp when the product was added to the cart.
responseFields._id: Unique identifier for the cart item.

endpoints.title: Add Item to Cart
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to add a product to their shopping cart. If the product already exists, its quantity is updated instead of adding a duplicate entry.

endpoints.title: Delete Item from Cart
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to remove a specific product from their shopping cart by providing the cart item ID.

200.description: Product removed from cart successfully.

cart.name: Wireless Mouse
cart.description: A high-quality wireless mouse with ergonomic design.

cart.name: Wireless Mouse
cart.description: A high-quality wireless mouse with ergonomic design.

endpoints.title: Empty Cart
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to empty all items from their shopping cart. A valid API key is required.

200.description: All items removed from the cart successfully.

sections.sectionDescription: section provides endpoints for managing user accounts, including login, registration, and profile updates.

endpoints.title: Register User
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows new users to create an account on the KeyCommerce platform by providing their name, username, email, and password.

endpoints.title: Login User
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows registered users to authenticate by providing their email and password. Upon successful authentication, a token will be returned for secure access to protected resources.

200.description: User logged in successfully.

sections.sectionDescription: section provides endpoints to handle pagination of product listings, ensuring smooth navigation through large datasets.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products filtered by a specific category. The category filter enables users to view only the products that belong to the selected category, making it easier to manage and browse the products based on their types. A valid API key must be included in the request headers for authorization.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by the specified category.

products.name: Desk Organizer
products.description: A wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments for stationery.

products.name: Pen Set
products.description: A set of pencils, pens, and markers for writing and drawing.

products.name: Printer
products.description: A high-quality printer for printing documents and photos.

products.name: Calculator
products.description: A portable calculator for quick calculations.

products.name: Leather Office Chair
products.description: Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products filtered by the category. Each product contains details such as name, price, description, category, and productImage.

products.name: Desk Organizer
products.description: A wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments for stationery.

endpoints.title: Get Limited Products Results
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve a limited number of products per page by specifying the limit query parameter. This is useful for paginating product listings, especially when dealing with a large number of products.

200.description: Returns a list of products based on the specified limit.

products.name: Wireless Mouse
products.description: A high-quality wireless mouse with ergonomic design.

products.name: Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling Bluetooth headphones with long battery life.

products.name: Laptop Stand
products.description: A sleek and adjustable laptop stand for ergonomic working.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.description: A smartwatch with fitness tracking and heart rate monitoring.

products.name: Desk Organizer
products.description: A wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments for stationery.

responseFields.productId: The unique identifier for the product.
responseFields.name: The name of the product.
responseFields.category: The category the product belongs to.
responseFields.productImage: The URL of the product image.
responseFields._id: The unique identifier for the product in the database.

products.name: Wireless Mouse
products.description: A high-quality wireless mouse with ergonomic design.

products.name: Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling Bluetooth headphones with long battery life.

products.name: Laptop Stand
products.description: A sleek and adjustable laptop stand for ergonomic working.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.description: A smartwatch with fitness tracking and heart rate monitoring.

products.name: Desk Organizer
products.description: A wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments for stationery.

endpoints.title: Skip Products Results
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to skip a specific number of products from the beginning of the result set, which is useful for pagination. By setting the skip query parameter, users can specify how many products to skip, allowing them to retrieve the next set of products for the next page in the pagination flow.

queryParams.skip: The number of products to skip from the beginning of the result set.

200.description: Returns a list of products after skipping the specified number of products.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, each product containing details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

endpoints.title: Sort Products by Price Descending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products sorted by price in descending order. The sortBy query parameter allows users to specify how the results should be sorted. In this case, products will be returned with the highest price first and the lowest price last, helping users view products in order of their price range.

queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how the results should be sorted. The format is field:direction (e.g., price:desc).

200.description: Returns a list of products sorted by price in descending order.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, each product containing details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.description: Ergonomic leather office chair with adjustable height and lumbar support.

products.name: Smartwatch
products.description: A smartwatch with fitness tracking and heart rate monitoring.

products.name: Wristwatch
products.description: Stylish wristwatch with a leather strap.

products.name: Bluetooth Headphones
products.description: Noise-cancelling Bluetooth headphones with long battery life.

endpoints.title: Sort Products by Price Ascending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products sorted by price in ascending order. The sortBy query parameter allows users to specify how the results should be sorted. In this case, products will be returned with the lowest price first and the highest price last, making it easier for users to view products within a specific price range.

queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how the results should be sorted. The format is field:direction (e.g., price:asc).

200.description: Returns a list of products sorted by price in ascending order.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category and Limit Results
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products filtered by a specific category and limits the number of results. By providing a category query parameter, users can filter the products to only those that belong to the selected category. Additionally, the limit query parameter specifies how many products to return, enabling pagination and better performance when retrieving large sets of data.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. It is a required parameter.
queryParams.limit: Specifies the number of products to return. Limits the number of results for better performance.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by the specified category and limited to the specified number of results.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, filtered by category and limited by the limit parameter. Each product contains details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Office Chair
products.description: Ergonomic office chair for long hours of work.

products.name: Desk Organizer
products.description: Keep your desk tidy and organized.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category and Skip Results
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products filtered by a specific category and skips a set number of results. The category query parameter filters products by the selected category, and the skip parameter allows users to skip a certain number of products, enabling better navigation through large datasets.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. It is a required parameter.
queryParams.skip: Specifies the number of products to skip in the results. Useful for pagination when navigating through large datasets.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by the specified category, skipping the first set of results.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, filtered by category and skipping the specified number of results. Each product contains details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Office Chair
products.description: Ergonomic office chair for long hours of work.

products.name: Desk Organizer
products.description: Keep your desk tidy and organized.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category and Sort by Price Descending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products filtered by a specific category (e.g., 'Office_Supplies') and sorted by price in descending order. The 'category' query parameter filters products by the selected category, and the 'sortBy' query parameter sorts the results based on the product price, with the most expensive products appearing first.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. It is a required parameter. For example, 'Office_Supplies'.
queryParams.sortBy: Sorts the products by a specific field. In this case, the products will be sorted by 'price' in descending order (e.g., 'price:desc'), meaning the highest-priced products will appear first.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by the specified category and sorted by price in descending order.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, filtered by category and sorted by price in descending order. Each product contains details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Premium Office Chair
products.description: Ergonomic office chair designed for comfort during long hours of work.

products.name: Executive Desk
products.description: Stylish and functional desk perfect for modern office setups.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category, Limit, and Skip
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products filtered by a specific category (e.g., 'Office_Supplies'), limit the number of results to a specified number (e.g., 5 products per page), and skip the first set of results (e.g., skip the first 5 products). This combination of parameters helps users paginate through the products in a specific category, making browsing easier for large datasets.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. For example, 'Office_Supplies'.
queryParams.limit: Specifies the number of products to return per page (e.g., 5).
queryParams.skip: Specifies the number of products to skip from the beginning of the result set (e.g., skip the first 5 products).

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category, limited to the specified number of results per page, and skipping the specified number of products.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, filtered by category, with the specified limit and skip. Each product contains details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Office Chair
products.description: Comfortable and ergonomic chair perfect for office use.

products.name: Desk Lamp
products.description: Adjustable desk lamp with a modern design.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category, Limit, and Sort by Price Descending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to retrieve products filtered by a specific category (e.g., 'Office_Supplies'), limit the number of results to a specified number (e.g., 5 products per page), and sort the products by their price in descending order. This combination of parameters helps users view the most expensive products in a given category with controlled pagination.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. For example, 'Office_Supplies'.
queryParams.limit: Specifies the number of products to return per page (e.g., 5).
queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:desc' sorts the products by price in descending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category, limited to the specified number of results per page, and sorted by price in descending order.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A message confirming that products have been fetched successfully.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, filtered by category, limited to the specified number of results per page, and sorted by price in descending order. Each product contains details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Executive Desk
products.description: Luxury executive desk with modern design and large workspace.

products.name: Office Chair
products.description: Comfortable and ergonomic office chair with adjustable features.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category, Limit, and Sort by Price Ascending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to filter products by a specified category (e.g., 'Office_Supplies'), limit the number of results to a specified number (e.g., 5 products per page), and sort the products by price in ascending order. This provides a refined way to browse products with better control over the displayed data, showcasing the least expensive items first.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. For example, 'Office_Supplies'.
queryParams.limit: Specifies the number of products to return per page (e.g., 5).
queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:asc' sorts the products by price in ascending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category, limited to the specified number of results per page, and sorted by price in ascending order.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A confirmation message that products have been successfully fetched.
responseFields.products: A list of products returned by the query, filtered by category, limited to the specified number of results per page, and sorted by price in ascending order. Each product contains details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

products.name: Basic Desk Organizer
products.description: A simple and affordable desk organizer for office supplies.

products.name: Compact Printer

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Category, Skip, and Sort by Price Descending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to filter products by a specified category (e.g., 'Office_Supplies'), skip a certain number of products (e.g., skip the first 5 products), and sort the results by price in descending order. This helps users view the next set of products in the category, ordered from the most expensive to the least expensive, excluding the initial results.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. For example, 'Office_Supplies'.
queryParams.skip: Specifies the number of products to skip. For example, 5 means the first 5 products will be excluded from the results.
queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:desc' sorts the products by price in descending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category, skipping the specified number of products, and sorted by price in descending order.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

responseFields.message: A confirmation message that products have been successfully fetched.
responseFields.products: A list of products matching the filters, excluding the specified number of products, and sorted by price in descending order. Each product includes details such as productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.
responseFields.total: Total number of products matching the query.
responseFields.page: The current page number of the results.
responseFields.limit: The number of products per page.

products.description: A wooden desk organizer with multiple compartments for stationery.

This helps users view the next set of products in the category, ordered from the least expensive to the most expensive, excluding the initial results.

queryParams.category: Specifies the category of products to filter by. For example, 'Office_Supplies'.
queryParams.skip: Specifies the number of products to skip. For example, 5 means the first 5 products will be excluded from the results.
queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:asc' sorts the products by price in ascending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category, skipping the specified number of products, and sorted by price in ascending order.

endpoints.title: Filter Products by Limit, Skip, and Sort by Price Descending
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows users to limit the number of products returned (e.g., 5 products per page), skip a specified number of products (e.g., skip the first 5 products), and sort the products by price in descending order. This combination of parameters is useful for paginating and viewing a specific set of sorted products.

queryParams.limit: Limits the number of products returned. Example: 5.
queryParams.skip: Specifies the number of products to skip. Example: 5 skips the first 5 products.
queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:desc' sorts the products by price in descending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products based on the applied filters (limit, skip, and sort).

responseFields.products: A list of products that match the applied filters. The list includes name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id for each product.
responseFields.total: The total number of products available.
responseFields.page: The current page number of the results.
responseFields.limit: The limit applied to the number of products per page.

This combination of parameters is useful for paginating and viewing a specific set of sorted products with the lowest prices first.

queryParams.limit: Limits the number of products returned. Example: 5.
queryParams.skip: Specifies the number of products to skip. Example: 5 skips the first 5 products.
queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:asc' sorts the products by price in ascending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products based on the applied filters (limit, skip, and sort).

queryParams.sortBy: Specifies how to sort the products. In this case, 'price:desc' sorts the products by price in descending order.

200.description: Returns a list of products filtered by category, limited by the specified number, skipping the specified number, and sorted by price in descending order.

sections.sectionDescription: The API key is used for authenticating requests to all routes within the KeyCommerce platform. It acts as middleware, ensuring that only authorized users with a valid API key can access the protected endpoints. The API key must be included in the request headers under the Authorization field as a Bearer token. This adds an extra layer of security, protecting sensitive data and operations from unauthorized access

endpoints.title: Generate API Key
endpoints.description: This endpoint allows authenticated users to generate a unique API key for accessing protected resources on the KeyCommerce platform. A valid Authorization token must be included in the request headers using the Bearer authentication scheme.

exampleResponse.message: API key generated successfully for user 67783eb3fa41e5a1afdf5e4c

responseFields.message: A confirmation message indicating whether the API key was successfully generated.
responseFields.apiKey: The newly generated API key required for authenticating future requests to protected resources on the KeyCommerce platform.

body.message: API key generated successfully for user 67783eb3fa41e5a1afdf5e4c

sections.sectionDescription: This folder contains endpoints for managing product categories and retrieving products by category within the user products section. These endpoints enable users to view all categories and fetch products belonging to a specific category. It ensures efficient categorization and filtering of products for better user experience.

endpoints.title: Get All Categories
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves all available product categories, helping users explore products within a specific category. A valid API key is required for authentication to access the categories list.

200.description: Successfully returns the list of categories.

responseFields.categories: A list of all available categories. This array contains names of product categories within the store.

endpoints.title: Get Products by Category
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves products that belong to a specific category. The category name is provided in the request URL. A valid API key is required for authentication to access the products within the specified category.

requestParameters.category_name: The name of the category to filter products by (e.g., Office_Supplies).

200.description: Successfully returns the list of products for the specified category.

exampleResponse.message: Successfully retrieved all available products for the specified category.

products.name: Product Name
products.description: Product description here.

404.description: No products found for the specified category.

responseFields.message: A response message indicating the success or failure of the request.
responseFields.category: The category for which the products are retrieved.
responseFields.products: An array of products that belong to the specified category. Each product contains details like productId, name, price, description, category, productImage, and _id.

body.message: Successfully retrieved all available products for the specified category.

products.name: Smartphone
products.description: Latest model of smartphone.
